title: Bassum station
text:
Bassum () is a <a href="railway%20station">railway station</a> located in <a href="Bassum">Bassum</a>, <a href="Germany">Germany</a>. The station is located on the <a href="Wanne-Eickel%E2%80%93Hamburg%20railway">Wanne-Eickel–Hamburg railway</a>. The train services are operated by <a href="Deutsche%20Bahn">Deutsche Bahn</a> and <a href="NordWestBahn">NordWestBahn</a>. The station has been part of the <a href="Bremen%20S-Bahn">Bremen S-Bahn</a> since December 2010.
